attributes.action: Monitor closely visa applications made from certain countries to ensure that the full rules of a visa are followed by staff working for the UK government abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure accountability to UK residents, staff who conduct interviews and/or are involved in the visa applications procedures should be randomly checked to ensure that they are following the requirements of the visa application clearly and that they are not handing out visas without due care and thought.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
